org.codice.ddf.ui.searchui.query.controller

Class ActivityController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codice.ddf.ui.searchui.query.controller.AbstractEventController
      • org.codice.ddf.ui.searchui.query.controller.ActivityController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osgi.service.event.EventHandler

    @Service
public class ActivityController
extends AbstractEventController
    The ActivityController handles the processing and routing of activities.

    • Method Detail

      • handleEvent

        public void handleEvent(org.osgi.service.event.Event event)
                 throws IllegalArgumentException
        Implementation of EventHandler.handleEvent(Event) that receives notifications published on the ActivityEvent.EVENT_TOPIC topic from the OSGi eventing framework and forwards them to their intended recipients.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when any of the following required properties are either missing from the Event or contain empty values:

        • ActivityEvent.ID_KEY
        • ActivityEvent.MESSAGE_KEY
        • ActivityEvent.TIMESTAMP_KEY
          • ActivityEvent.STATUS_KEY
        • ActivityEvent.USER_ID_KEY

      • getActivitiesForUser

        public List<Map<String,Object>> getActivitiesForUser(String userId)
